title: What's the usual non ult Zed all in Combo?
body: Is it,  W-E-Q-W-Auto? Or W-W-E-Q-Auto? or something else?

replies.body:
If you're trying to poke: **Shadow -> Slow -> Shurikan.**

If you're trying to kill: **Repeat the process above until they are low enough, and then proceed with: Shadow -> Slow -> Shurikan -> (If it is safe) Shadow -> Use all your actives {{summoner:14}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3142}} etc -> Follow up with auto attacks.**
